snippet: As you may have heard, Facebook scooped up the profitless photo-sharing app, Instagram, for a cool $1 billion on Monday. Now some have started placing bets on which start-ups the social network will acquire next.
abstract: As you may have heard, Facebook scooped up the profitless photo-sharing app, Instagram, for a cool $1 billion on Monday. Now some have started placing bets on which start-ups the social network will acquire next.

headline.main: Want to Place Bets on Facebook's Next Acquisition?
